name: Emily
ownerTitle: Design Systems Engineer and curator of Dogs of Dev
bio: aka Moo-Moo, aka Moo-Moo Magoo. Loves fluffy pillows and snuggles. Adopted from Hudson's Halfway Home, which rescues dogs with special needs. (She has a cleft palate.)

name: Geno
ownerTitle: Design Systems Engineer and curator of Dogs of Dev
bio: aka Gee-Gee, aka Gee-Gee McGee. Our dear Geno was the best guard dog, an eager snuggler, incredibly patient and gentle with our kids, and integral part of our family. We love him and miss him so much.

name: Boomer
bio: A whippet mix who lived life at an 11.

name: Dana
bio: 7yr old Beagle living life in Guadalajara Mexico

name: Lulu
bio: 5yr old kind of pitbull rescued from the streets of Guadalajara Mexico

name: Pippa
bio: A miniature Jack Russell. Pip (full name Phillipa Mabel Burger) as a pup sustained a head injury whilst with the breeder. As a result she's a crazy little cutie who still wees on the carpet at 2 years old, but is soft and cuddly so nobody can stay cross.

name: Honey
bio: Honey Fallula Burger. A Jack Russell that's full of life and character - loves to sleep like a hooman, loves her hooman brothers and sisters - super friendly with all dogs - the bigger the better! Like to bark to tell us what's going on or keep us safe.

name: Ham
bio: Hamilton Sebastian Burger aka "Handsome Ham". Jack Russell. A little bit crazy - likes to chase his tail, do wiggly nervous dances for other dogs (and cats) and kiss faces.

name: Maple
bio: Maple died in August 2020 due to liver failure. She was a saint shepherd. We miss her so I would really love to commemorate her using this site.

name: Milo
bio: Milo's a rescue mutt from Tennessee now living in Connecticut. He loves to play but is fine with a full day of naps if that's what we're doing. He's 4 years old, is super sweet, causes no trouble, 5 stars.

name: Belle
bio: Loves a tummy rub almost as much as any foodstuff :-)

name: Charlie
ownerTitle: Senior Software Engineer at Veeva Systems
bio: Originally born in Mena, Arkansas. Charlie now lives in Virginia. He can usually be found pulling his dad on roller blades, or raking up several hundred upvotes on the NoVa subreddit.

name: Ram√≥n
bio: Ram√≥n, a rescued pug when he was 6 months old. He is now 2 years old. He and his family are Costa Rican and he loves going to forests and explore in the outside.

name: Ty
bio: Ty (rhymes with "hi!") is a bouncy, cat-obsessed, lurcher. He moved in with us after we adopted him from Edinburgh Dog and Cat Home and he's currently 2ish years old. His favourite activity is waiting for a zoom call to start and squeaking nearby toys relentlessly.

name: Rambo
bio: At 13.5 years old he is still a good boy.

name: Cow
bio: Cow is an 8 month old Swiss shepherd. His hobbies include destroying toys, running away from small dogs, and getting his back scratched.

name: Finn
bio: I‚Äôm a three year old Beagle Chihuahua mix living in Portland, Oregon. I love playing on the beach, going on walks, and eating all foods. My parents call me Finn, Miffin, Pinn, Pimm, Pimmela, and dozens of others - it‚Äôs confusing.

name: Loch Ness Monster
bio: She‚Äôs earned her name. (Specifically the monster part.)

name: Boo
bio: Border Collie about 9 years old. Started as a foster but became forever!

name: Coco
bio: I'm a golden doodle living with my family in Silicon Valley. I love belly rubs, car rides and food.

name: Roscoe and Bandit
bio: Roscoe and Bandit are very good boys. They are each Oklahoma rescue dogs miniature schnauzers who love that I work from home now. We‚Äôve had them for 5 and 6 years respectively. They love snuggling in my lap when there isn‚Äôt a computer in the way, and sometimes even if there is.

name: Morty
bio: Hey, my name is Morty. I'm a golden retriever and a good boy. Im three years old and love my family.

name: Lupe
bio: Lupe is a 3 year-old deer head chihuahua. She was found as a 2 year-old stray, and has convinced Andrew that chihuahuas can be really really cute. Lupe loves to run, cuddle, and get bellyrubs from people she has just met.

name: Walter
ownerTitle: Tracey: Front End Engineer, National Kidney Foundation/ Patrick: Developer, Sparkbox
bio: Walter is a social butterfly who has a neighborhood fan club. His eyebrows cannot be stopped. Named after Walter Matheau of Grumpy Old Men fame.

name: Rudy
ownerTitle: Design studio partner/web animation tutorial creator
bio: Rudy is a 14-year-old dachshund with impressive napping skills living in the Seattle area. He was adopted as a 10-year-old senior and has only gotten better with age. He's also a total foodie who is always cruising the kitchen for snacks.

name: Dewey
ownerTitle: Design studio partner/web animation tutorial creator
bio: Dewey is a 10-year-old dachshund living in the Seattle area. His skills include napping, barking at birds and finding an available lap in any situation. He's a special needs dog with a few medical conditions and only 3 teeth, but despite it all, he's the sweetest little guy.

name: Diesel
bio: Lurcher rescued from Dogs Trust. Lover of sofas, cheese and electric blankets. Naughty, but handsome enough to get away with it.

name: Remus
ownerTitle: Front End Dev, Speaker, Dog Lover
bio: Remus (or Remi to his friends), likes to play with his pig, loves having visitors and takes his role as a living Pomodoro timer very seriously!

name: Atlas
bio: Loves herding, fetch, and anything to do with food. Rescued and raised in Seattle ‚ù§Ô∏è

name: Samson
bio: Sammy is a crumb hound. He's a very chill, snuggly guy.

name: Lucie Moon
bio: Lucie is a high energy Puli who loves guarding the house and taking care of flock.

name: Franklin and Maggie
bio: Maggie is a golden retriever/border collie who gets frequently annoyed by her little brother, Franklin, a mini goldendoodle. They reside outside of Nashville, TN and enjoy long walks and rides in the car.

name: Wasabi
bio: Loves to sit under my desk and drop bombs to remind me of her presence, came to us via Pet Rescue :). Wolfhound/Rhodesian Ridgeback mix

name: Emma
bio: Emma is a dalmatian and knows that she is a cutie. When she is not demanding cuddles from my colleagues at work she takes care of her two tiny humans at home.

name: Siri
bio: Siri is an almost 10 month old French Bulldog who loves cuddles, playtime and people (more than other dogs). Some nicknames include 'pig', 'piglet', and 'piggy' because she makes a lot of pig-like noises.

name: Lili
bio: Lily, 6, enjoys extremely long walks leading to anywhere or nowhere and never giving the ball back when we're supposed to be playing fetch.

name: Pillow
bio: She is a golden retriever, a little over 2 years. She is a sweet, kind, loving, needy, tantrum-throwing child. Her day is filled with activities like being goofy, chasing pigeon on the terrace. She also likes to be picked up like a "smol" pup that she is.

name: Miss Muffin
ownerTitle: Creative Technologist. Adventurer. Programmer. Consultant. Speaker.
bio: Miss Muffin is a welsh corgi cardigan, born in 2009. She lives and reign like a queen in Karlsruhe, Germany.

name: Abby
bio: Abby is a three-legged rescue with a heart of gold. She loves short walks (read: hops), chasing groundhogs, and eating carrot tops.

name: Brody
bio: Brody is a rescue from Romania. His English is getting better - his favourite words are sausage and walk. When he's not doing zoomies or sleeping he likes to sing along to opera music.

name: Blizzard
ownerTitle: Designer, developer, musician and overall a pretty nice guy
bio: An experienced Fur Stack Barkitect, Blizzard is a White Swiss Shepherd that spends his days trolling his owners to throw him the ball but not actually giving it to them

name: Wesley
bio: Fetch is life. Water is the worst. I try to use my cuteness to get away with a lot of mischief.

name: Big Suze
bio: This is Big Suze, she‚Äôs an Irish Terrier born on May 21st, which is coincidentally also my birthday too.

name: Luna
bio: Luna is a 4-year old Beagle who's always on the balcony minding other people's business like their own. She has a lot of toys and all of them are her favorite.

name: A√ßucar
bio: A√ßucar means Sugar in Portuguese. He got his name for being the sweetest boy you could have ever met. He is around 4 years old and was adopted from a shelter in March 2020. His favorite hobby is cuddling.

name: Dino Burrito
bio: Dino is a tortilla filled with muscles turned compassionate, sentient being. He is a mix of bloodhound, pitt, boxer and rottweiler. He loves going on walks, standing on your feet during hugs and protecting his humans. We're lucky to have him in our family.

name: Bailey
bio: Very bouncy and energetic. Doesn't like the cold.

name: Swift
bio: Swift (Swifty) has the kennel club name "Chazak - Dressed to impress" because when he was a puppy it looked like he was wearing a tuxedo. He enjoys parks for their squirrels and loaves of brown bread. But his favourite place is the office.

name: Frieda
bio: Frieda is a 5-ish year old loving Chihuahua mix rescued from the streets of Tijuana, Mexico and adopted from Waggytail Rescue in NYC. She's a champion snuggler who enjoys rummaging for treats and barking at other dogs while on the leash.

name: Nexus Inkwell
bio: Part bear, cat, wolf, red panda and raccoon. He's a chatty, playful and attention loving beast to all willing to approach him.

name: Rooney
bio: 3.5 years old, indie, picked from the streets, very chill guy

name: Montie
bio: A rescue poodle-ish with very calm nature - unless out cat is around when it's "play time"

name: Sophia Lorem Ipsum
bio: Hi, I‚Äôm adopted terrier mix (of some sort). Adopted from Finding a Best Friend Rescue! 14lbs, likes üßÄ, Gotcha day 7/15/20

name: Loutro
bio: She's a cross between a Border Collie and Chesapeake Bay Retriever and is super chill as long as you're not throwing a stick. If you do happen to have a stick then good luck - you'll need it.

name: Torrin
bio: Torrin is a cross between a Bearded Collie and Border Collie. Her hair grows to about 30cm long and GETS EVERYWHERE. She's best likened to a Gremlin‚Äîshe looks very cute but be careful because she can and will become a manic devil.

name: Cupcake
bio: Maltipoo, lover of stuffed alpacas, shredder of stuffed pigs, and fearless (yet tiny) defender.

name: Rudy
bio: aka Rudo, aka Rudo Prosciutto, aka Dodo, aka Doedie, aka Girlie

name: Rambo
bio: Be careful! He'll draw first blood ü©∏! Well ... not really. He's the most mild mannered dog in the world. He rarely barks. When one does come out, he seems a bit surprised himself.

name: Nova
bio: am girl doge nova nova scosh scosher morosher scosher scoshy moroshy

name: Tanuki
bio: My name comes from my breed - I'm a coonhound mix, and a "tanuki" is a Japanese racoon dog. They're known in folklore for being very mischievous creatures--do with that information what you will. I love eating peanut butter, sprawling across the entire bed, and making new friends

name: Benny
bio: Benny is nearly 4 and came to his new home through Southern Golden Retriever Rescue. He is a lovely, friendly and (very) inquisitive boy. This often leads to him getting up to mischief but this is just because he wants to meet everyone and play!

name: Pas
bio: Pas looks like a psycho-hyena driven by a nuclear reactor, but the truth is he's just a gentle giant puppy, full of energy, love, and care.

name: Apollo
bio: My best companion

name: Togo
bio: Togo the dog loves to go swimming! He's the sweetest dog ever. He's 12 years old now and he was adopted from Hermiston, Oregon. His favorite treat is a crunchy carrot!

name: Clover
bio: Clover (aka Duke Clovington, aka Professor Good Boy) loves cuddling, going on adventures, and eating cheese. When he's not out camping or hiking he likes to lounge in the sun, nap in bed, and chew any underwear that was accidentally left on the ground.

name: Rylie
bio: Sheltie/Pomeranian Mix

name: Nugget
bio: An 11lb Chiweenie named Nugget. We rescued him from a kill shelter through an org called Second Chance. He loves food and squirrels and hanging with his mom. He's also an excellent traveler. Been to 5 states and 3 countries.

name: Priscilla, Queen of the Desert
bio: Priscilla was an Australian Shepherd who loved bossing around her brother Harry, playing tug, and long walks but not on wet grass. Everyone was her friend except children. Children are like small zombies.

name: Prince Harry
bio: Harry is a Jack Russell mix who used to run the mean streets of New Orleans until he crossed my path. He's into hard core cuddles and lots of kisses. He enjoys, even demands, belly rubs and hoarding toys from his sister Priscilla.

name: Nina
bio: Nina/Beany/Queenie/Chocho Li√±o is our 1 year old Belgian Malinois currently living in Manchester, UK!

name: Max
bio: Max is a Yorkshire Terrier, adopted in November 2019 when he was just 6 months old. He loves our family and isn't very nice to anyone else.

name: Matilda
bio: Matilda (Tilly for short) is a mini sheepadoodle. We adopted her in August 2021 when she was just 6 weeks old. She‚Äôs super sweet and loves being pet by everyone.

name: Ciastek
bio: Cookie/Leszek/Mother Flutter. His is good in barking/eating & loving every human around him.

name: Demon
bio: Demon is a friendly Havanese. He loves people and always tries to solicit pets from strangers. His hobbies include digging in the sand, being loud, and running around in circles.

name: Warren
bio: Warren the noodlenose is a 2 year old rescue greyhound. He loves to alternate between being a couch potato and having the zoomies and barking in your face. Warren loooooves that his mom works from home so he has her all to himself :)

name: Ruby
bio: Ruby's a toy Poodle who loves pretty much everyone and has more energy something her size has any right to have.

name: Betty
bio: Hyper-energetic bundle of joy who loves to whine, bark, perform tricks and take long walks in the dog forest.

name: Moomoo
bio: If you're ever looking for me just close your eyes and listen to the rumbling of my snoring. I require at least 10-20 minutes of uninterrupted tummy rubs every hour, and I will make sure you are aware when it's time. I'm always on time, so that means I expect my dinner prompt!

name: Maisie
bio: A scruffy menace. Loves barking; hates the rain.

name: Zelda
bio: We brought home our puppy in 2015, right after our five-year wedding anniversary. She is a good girl.

name: Norris
bio: I am Norris the Corgi, not a cross, a full Pembrokeshire Corgi from Wales. Yes you don't see many corgis around these days, especially not my color. Yes I am stunning and everyone says I know it. I love cuddles and playtime, especially when Mum is trying to code!

name: DD
bio: DD the doodle dog!

name: Dash
bio: Dash is a Chihuahua with a smidge of Papillon we adopted from a foster parent who saved him from a tough early life. His hobbies are pillow, blanket pile, deranged sprint/hunt, and lick. He's a quiet, gentle little guy unless you're at a dog park (scared) or UPS/FedEx (enraged).

name: Buster
bio: Buster is a cairn terrier with boundless love in his heart, but don‚Äôt be fooled by his playful demeanor and handsome smile: This pup has opinions, especially when it comes to small children riding bicycles too fast or cats that don‚Äôt want to say hello for some reason.

name: Grass Jelly
bio: Hi there! It's Grass 'JB' Jelly, black & tan Shiba Inu. Always smiling. You might know me as a web & art projects muse. Fun facts: I spin counter clockwise without command. I once got into a duel with a skunk & thus earned the title Stinky Boy. My eyebrows are the best eyebrows.

name: Frankie
bio: Frankie is a sweet ol‚Äô gal who loves snuggling and sleeping in and playing keep-away. She‚Äôs shy around other dogs, but she‚Äôs a lover of all people. In between naps she enjoys her part-time job as a cheese tax collector.

name: Spark
bio: This is Spark; A chihuahua/terrier mix and probably the dumbest dog you'll ever meet. He smells like the armpits of a marathon runner, barks at everything he sees, and he's REALLY excited to see you. If you get close to him, he'll lick you a whole lot.
